name: Magic Tiles 3 Free Music Game
description:
Among the many free games in 2019, Magic Tiles 3 ™ is one of the most popular piano games with over 100 million players worldwide.

This is a unique piano game, because you can use other instruments such as guitars and drums. In addition, this is a piano game

feature known for its high-quality piano music and beautiful game style :

-Allows you to use more instruments such as guitars, pianos, etc. in the band mode-Allows you
to play with Players from all over the world play against each other
-in the battle mode you can customize the game with friends or objects you specify
-collect high-quality piano music, and frequently update popular songs
-in the challenge mode allows players to practice to increase their click speed to
